Text: Traceroute is a 2016 Austrian/American documentary film directed by Johannes Grenzfurthner.
Triplets:<Traceroute
1:
--------------------
Text: Traceroute (film):  The autobiographical documentary and road movie deals with the history, politics and impact of nerd culture.
Triplets:<Traceroute
2:
--------------------
Text: Traceroute (film):  Grenzfurthner calls his film a "personal journey into the uncharted depths of nerd culture, a realm full of dangers, creatures and more or less precarious working conditions", an attempt to "chase the ghosts of nerddom's past, present and future."
Triplets:<Traceroute
4:
<Text: Traceroute (film):  It features music by Kasson Crooker, Hans Nieswandt, and many others.>
